changelog:
!!!WARNING!!!!
!!!ONLY CLEAN INSTALLATION IS POSSIBLE!!!!

Device side:
- improved notch handling
- removed AOD from settings (we have to live with LCD screen)
- switched to ReloadedKernel upstreamed to 4.9.143 (credits to @RiteshSaxena) 
- updated touchscreen firmware to the latest 8.12.6 
- added FMRadio

Rom side:
- Android 9.0.0_R21 (December security patch)
- Font Manager
- Fully customizable Smart NavBar
- Link notification volume option
- Disable locksreen charging info option
- Hide check button when using PIN quick unlock

NOTE: the date of security patch is set to 1st October to pass safetynet. Though ROM has all changes from December security patch merged in
